subject: Football
Super Bowl
Blacks
lead_paragraph: Marlin Briscoe, the first African-American to start at quarterback in the A.F.L. or the modern N.F.L., can watch with pride as Russell Wilson takes the field with the Seahawks on Sunday.
snippet: Marlin Briscoe, the first African-American to start at quarterback in the A.F.L. or the modern N.F.L., can watch with pride as Russell Wilson takes the field with the Seahawks on Sunday.
